name: Virtual Exhibition
description:
The Virtual Exhibition makes it possible to visit a gallery from the comfort of your own home and behaves like a real gallery, which is curated by me.

The first photographers to be exhibited are Flo Slomka, Robert Krenciszek and Christian Thiele. Besides other photographers and also galleries, the Virtual Exhibition will be regularly extended by new functions as a long-term project.

I am a photographer and not a developer. So I want to use this project to develop new skills. That is also why the exhibitions currently take place in the context of photography.

When the beta phase is over and I can offer enough features within the application, I am interested in launching open calls to the community to create special exhibitions with you.
